title: body-test-v2
body:
## Test multiple BODY functions ##

Markfown *should* not be rendered in BODY

HTML in BODY

📣 Inclusion

%CONTENT%

📣 Inclusion with markdown disabled

%CONTENT?markdown=0%

📣 Inclusion with unknown parameter

%CONTENT?falsething=0%

📣 Inclusion with headeranchor set to mode 1

%CONTENT?headeranchor=1%

📣 Inclusion with headerid set from 2 to 5

%CONTENT?headerid=2-5&headeranchor=2%

📣 Inclusion with urllinker set to 0

%CONTENT?urllinker=0%

This should not work

%CONTENT % %FDS%
content:
# my first title

## my second title

## This is another title again and again, but this one is loooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooonnnnnnnnger with lot of words

### sub sub title

#### sub sub sub title

Dû tëxte encodé àveç dès châräctères nôn ASCII

イリノイ州シカゴにて、アイルランド系の家庭に、9

https://club1.fr
